title: Person of Interest 3x10 The Devil's Share Opening Scene
author: Strie
comment: they really show how carter's death affects them.  Her son is devastated, Fusco lost a colleague who believed that he could be a good man.  Finch lost a friend who had helped him since he and Reese had started working.  Shaw has gone psychotic searching for her killer.   And Reese.....Reese has turned cold after this, wanting nothing but vengeance for his fallen friend. This is how characters should react, this really is great writing and filming, and not a single word was muttered
They always choose the perfect music...
This show is so underrated. Deserved many Emmys!

I love how we hear the monitor beeping at the beginning symbolizing John's survival and then at the end of the episode we see the monitor again except, this time, it's Simmons heartbeat and it flat-lines, signaling his death. I love this show.
Regardless of how many times I see this opening, I still manage to sob like the first time. Brilliant writing, brilliant choice of music and brilliant show.
